name: The (ishdx, maskarinec)
description:
The is a spooky bullet hell game. You can sacrifice things, but be careful what you sacrifice. It can come to bite you in the leg later.

THIS GAME FUCKING SUCKSSSS

the game is so bad i didn't even finish the title

Overscoped with awkward dialogue, but oh well, I was fucked by muself and the time, i was procraticanticinging in the beginining and im currently writinig this as im screaming in pain after making this bullshit project.  i hope you will not expereience agony while playing this and yes please don't play this fucking game i only publish it becuase i dont wanna feel like i wasted a week, but i promise given more time i probably could've made something better anyway enjoy and expect tons and tons of bugs   

and although im saying "i" i don't take full credit as i got another guy who was

really helpful with doing base stuff
